sentences.sContent: You can always expect a few words of wisdom from Dave.
sentences.sCn: 戴夫总能冒出几句至理名言。

sentences.sContent: ...Jung's wisdom certainly seems to apply to our bodies...

...They practically beg a user to ignore the long-suffering professor struggling to pass on accumulated wisdom from the front of the room - a prospect that teachers find most irritating and students view as...
...I'm not suggesting that poetry will guide our legislators to wisdom any more than prayer has...

synos.tran: 智慧，才智；明智；学识；至理名言

phrases.pCn: 传统智慧，传统观点；世俗认知

trans.tranOther: good sense and judgment, based especially on your experience of life
